contentrichtext.text: The '''Tiger''' ( '''[[wiktionary:虎|虎]]''' ), is one of the 12-year cycle of animals which appear in the [[Chinese zodiac]] related to the [[Chinese calendar]]. The '''Year of the [[Tiger]]''' is associated with the [[Earthly Branches|earthly branch symbol]] '''[[wiktionary:寅|寅]]'''. [[File:Tiger.svg|right|170px]] == Years and the Five Elements == [[File:Kuniyoshi Utagawa, Tiger.jpg|thumb|right|upright|19th century painting of a tiger by [[Kuniyoshi Utagawa]].|170px]] People born within these date ranges can be said to have been born in the "Year of the Tiger", while also bearing the following [[Wu Xing|elemental]] sign:<ref>http://pinyin.info/chinese_new_year/</ref> <!-- Only the first year of the pair is linked, since in the simplest case, that is *the* year. --> *8 February 1902 – 28 January 1903: [[Water (Wu Xing)|Water]] Tiger *26 January 1914 – 13 February 1915: [[Tree (Wu Xing)|Wood]] Tiger *13 February 1926 – 1 February 1927: [[Fire (Wu Xing)|Fire]] Tiger *31 January 1938 – 18 February 1939: [[Earth (Wu Xing)|Earth]] Tiger *17 February 1950 – 5 February 1951: [[Metal (Wu Xing)|Metal]] Tiger *5 February 1962 – 24 January 1963: Water Tiger *23 January 1974 – 10 February 1975: Wood Tiger *9 February 1986 – 28 January 1987: Fire Tiger *28 January 1998 – 15 February 1999: Earth Tiger *14 February 2010 – 2 February 2011: Metal Tiger *1 February 2022 - 21 January 2023: Water Tiger *19 February 2034 - 7 February 2035: Wood Tiger == See also == *[[Tiger]] *[[Burmese zodiac]] == References == {{reflist}} {{commons|Category:Tiger (zodiac)|Tiger (zodiac)}} {{Chinese Zodiac}} [[Category:Chinese astrology]] [[Category:Vietnamese astrology]] [[Category:Astrological signs]] [[Category:Tigers in popular culture]] [[Category:Mythological felines]] [[de:Chinesische Astrologie#Zählung ab Jahresbeginn]]
